readable.title: 2516317118_10ae66b87a
readable.content: A little boy is putting some cutout letters on the wall . A small child is playing with cut-outs of the letter " P. " A toddler sticks paper " P " letters to a wood paneled wall . The child is sticking paper letters to a wooden wall . Toddler in pajamas plays with paper cutouts of the letter " P " .
